name: Allip
languages: the languages it knew in life

traits.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The allip can move through other creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}. It takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

actions.name: Maddening Touch
entries: {@atk ms} +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (4d6 + 3 damage) psychic damage.

actions.name: Whispers of Madness
entries: The allip chooses up to three creatures it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw, or it takes 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) psychic damage and must use its reaction to make a melee weapon attack against one creature of the allip's choice that the allip can see. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.

actions.name: Howling Babble {@recharge}
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the allip that can hear it must make a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 12 (2d8 + 3 damage) psychic damage, and it is {@condition stunned} until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}. Constructs and undead are immune to this effect.
